note.p: Wharf keeper. At Mardol Quay in Shrewsbury. Carrier, wharfinger, and general agent, 1861. Purchased The Mount, Shrewsbury, in 1867, and rented it out.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1873/83/1)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 6 September 2019)
